useCases.title: Bug triage to patch
useCases.description: Trigger a fix directly from the incident issue and get a reviewable PR without switching tools.
useCases.example: @porter opencode reproduce and patch oauth callback mismatch from logs in issue body

useCases.title: Large refactors
useCases.description: Drive architecture cleanups from an issue-scoped plan with one auditable thread from request to merged code.
useCases.example: @porter claude migrate legacy REST handlers to shared service layer and preserve existing contracts

useCases.title: Test coverage before release
useCases.description: Generate targeted tests around risky code paths before cutover windows or major dependency upgrades.
useCases.example: @porter amp add tests for checkout retry, timeout fallback, and webhook signature edge cases

useCases.title: Dependency upgrades
useCases.description: Automate framework and package migrations with acceptance criteria defined in the issue.
useCases.example: @porter opencode upgrade to react 19, replace deprecated APIs, and include migration notes in PR
